goldens.input: How do I reset my password?
goldens.expected_output: Click 'Forgot Password', enter email, check inbox for reset link

goldens.input: What are your business hours?
goldens.expected_output: Monday-Friday 9 AM to 5 PM EST

goldens.input: I'm facing issues with login credentials
goldens.expected_output: Please go through our guide to login page for a step by step process

goldens.input: What is the customer support contact no.
goldens.expected_output: you can reach out to our team at +22222222

goldens.input: When can I expect to have my memebrship activated
goldens.expected_output: It usually take 24 hrs for you memebership to get activated post paymet processing

goldens.input: Is there any discount avaialbel for product SKU No. 14526
goldens.expected_output: Yes, you can avail the discount using coupn code DIS56

goldens.input: Can I cancel my order for which the payment is already made
goldens.expected_output: You can cancel your order within 24 hrs subject to zero additional charges

goldens.input: What are the steps to cancel my order
goldens.expected_output: You can find cancellation process details in our cancellation policy guide

goldens.input: How do I raise a refund request
goldens.expected_output: You can find details for refund in our refund policy doc on help page

goldens.input: I want to deactivate my notifications
goldens.expected_output: You can deactivate your notification by going to setting->notification->app->deactivate

goldens.input: How long does it take to ship the product
goldens.expected_output: The produt will be shipped within 2-7 days of processing payment

goldens.input: What is your return policy
goldens.expected_output: You can return any product within 30 days. For any otehr information please read our return policy guide

goldens.input: How can I get access to your product list
goldens.expected_output: You can share your email here and we will mail you the product list

goldens.input: Can I return a product bought online to any of your stores
goldens.expected_output: Yes, you can return to any store nearby

goldens.input: I was charged twice for the same order, how do I get a refund?
goldens.expected_output: Contact billing support with order number, they'll investigate duplicate charge and process refund within 5-7 business days

goldens.input: My payment is not being accepted
goldens.expected_output: Apologies for the trouble. It could possibly be a server issue. Kindly use teh follwing link to make the payment

goldens.input: I did not recieve order notification post payment
goldens.expected_output: It usually take 2-6 hrs for us to process payments. Please contact +22334252 if you've already passed that window

goldens.input: My discount coupon not working
goldens.expected_output: It is possible taht your valididty is expired. Kidnly share the coupon code here for us to procese the issue

goldens.input: Havent recieved the refund yet
goldens.expected_output: It usually take about 7-13 days for teh refund to reflect in your bank account. Please contact +3417538261 if you've already passed that window

goldens.input: I recieved a wrong product
goldens.expected_output: Sincere apologies. We request you to kindly conact +45362728 in order to address your concern and deliver the ordered product

goldens.input: It's been 14 days and my product is not delivered yet
goldens.expected_output: Sincere apologies for the delay. This could possibly due to shipping issues. Kindly contact our team at +36737217 so we can escalate your request

goldens.input: My OTP has expired for subscription.
goldens.expected_output: No issues if your subscription is still active you can request a new OTP using our generate OTP tab on login page

goldens.input: I need to export my data under GDPR, cancel my subscription, delete my account, but keep my order history for tax purposes - what's the process?
goldens.expected_output: Step-by-step process: 1) Request data export via settings, 2) Cancel subscription (keeps order history), 3) Submit GDPR deletion request specifying to retain order records for legal compliance

goldens.input: I want return the product due to defect, it has crossed 30 day return window
goldens.expected_output: Unfortunately we do not accept return post 30 day window. For further assitance kindly contact our support team at +362769487

goldens.input: I want to change my address for pickup
goldens.expected_output: Sure. Please provide your updated address in the link here. You can also reach out to our support team at +37626489 to make the changes

goldens.input: I want to you to match the price qouted on th website with what I paid offline
goldens.expected_output: We have separate pricing for our online and offline SKU mentioned in our company guide. Rest assured that your paid the fair price for teh product

goldens.input: I am not able to change location on my app
goldens.expected_output: This is an app store issue.On your app stor go to settings-> profile->chaneg location.

goldens.input: I want to report issue with my product that has passed warranty
goldens.expected_output: Apologies for the inconvenience. Kindly contact our team at +5527648 and we'll guide your through our service policy

goldens.input: How do I install the Python package?
goldens.expected_output: Run: pip install package-name

goldens.input: How do I authenticate API requests?
goldens.expected_output: Include API key in Authorization header: 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'. Get key from dashboard settings.

goldens.input: How do I implement custom authentication with OAuth2, handle token refresh, and manage multiple user sessions with rate limiting?
goldens.expected_output: Multi-step implementation guide covering OAuth2 flow, refresh token storage, session management with Redis, and rate limiting per user with token bucket algorithm

goldens.input: I need wireless headphones under $100
goldens.expected_output: Recommended options: Sony WH-CH520 ($58), Anker Soundcore Q30 ($79), JBL Tune 510BT ($49)
